H0.text: Shaking the mixture of iron filings and sand will cause the iron filings to rise to the surface, allowing Katie to separate them.

H1.text: Adding water to the mixture, and the sand will dissolve in the water is how Katie can separate the iron filings from the sand.

H2.text: Putting the mixture through a sieve will keep the sand in the sieve, allowing Katie to separate the iron filings from the sand.

H3.text: Passing a magnet over the mixture will attract the iron filings, allowing Katie to separate them from the sand.

A4.text: Magnetic separation is the process of separating components of mixtures by using a magnet to attract magnetic substances.

A5.text: The process that is used for magnetic separation separates non-magnetic substances from those which are magnetic.
